mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ebd_episode (num, writer, title, content , imgPath, viewcnt ,regdate) VALUES(ebd_episode_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imgPath}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, content, imgpath , viewcnt, regdate FROM ebd_episode
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{content} || '%'
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%' || #{writer} || '%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM),0) FROM ebd_episode
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{content} || '%'
WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%' || #{writer} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ebd_episode_heart (num, target_num, writer) VALUES(ebd_wording_heart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{target_num}, #{nick})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ebd_episode_heart WHERE target_num=#{target_num} AND writer=#{nick}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, imgPath, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM ebd_episode ORDER BY num DESC) WHERE num=#{num}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT r2.heartcnt, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT NVL(r1.heartcnt,0) heartcnt FROM (select target_num, count(*) heartcnt FROM ebd_episode_heart GROUP BY target_num) r1, ebd_episode e
WHERE (title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{content} || '%') AND r1.target_num(+) = e.num
WHERE (title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%') AND r1.target_num(+) = e.num
WHERE (e.writer LIKE '%' || #{writer} || '%') AND r1.target_num(+) = e.num
WHERE r1.target_num(+) = e.num
ORDER BY num DESC) r2) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT target_num, count(*) heartcnt FROM ebd_episode_heart WHERE target_num=#{num} GROUP BY target_num
